description: This easy pasta recipe is perfect for a healthier dinner for one. This deliciously hearty pasta is nutritionally approved and ready in 20 minutes.
keywords: Pasta,Low saturated fat,Nicky,Dinner for one,Bonus,Healthier Easier,Weeknight dinner,Low sugar,Budget,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Jan Feb 2022,Tomato,Low fat
name: Tomato, Bean & Rocket Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
200g canned borlotti beans, rinsed, drained (see Tip)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a saucepan of boiling water according to packet instructions. Drain.
Meanwhile, heat oil a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook garlic, capsicum, tomato and beans for 5 minute, stirring, or until capsicum is tender.
Add pasta and lemon juice to pan and toss to coat. Add rocket and toss to combine. Season with pepper. Serve.
